if(WASMEDGE_BUILD_AOT_RUNTIME)
  add_subdirectory(blake3)
endif()

if(WASMEDGE_PLUGIN_WASI_NN_BACKEND)
  string(TOLOWER ${WASMEDGE_PLUGIN_WASI_NN_BACKEND} BACKEND)
  if(BACKEND STREQUAL "ggml")
    add_subdirectory(ggml)
  endif()
endif()
